title: What are the latest future technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: The future of any new technology is that at some point it too will be replaced by a newer technology until we reach the limits of physics; or drive ourselves extinct from the overuse of technology and the pollution of the ecosystem to produce the products. At some point if alien life ever does come here they will say “Strange creature these humans they will destroy themselves to build toys”.
The “why is that” is self explanatory !
